definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not
is or isn't/yes or no/whether or not

sentences.english: Yeah, like gentle breeze blowing through the cheeks, the hair dancing in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 是的，像微風吹過面頰，因爲髮梢在跳舞。

sentences.english: It was easily good enough for pole so that was the main thing.
sentences.chinese: 那一圈跑得不錯，足以使我獲得杆位，那是最主要的。

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出產性活動己的總稱能夠舉行。

sentences.english: So is an change for the better, like birth and death which convulse the body.
sentences.chinese: 向更好的轉變也是如此，和顛覆身體的生死一樣。

sentences.english: The result is, that it is not necessary to use gibberlin acid.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果是，種子不必經過酸處理也可以發芽。

sentences.english: You’re probably one of those weirdos that doesn’t drink coffee in the morning either.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能也是那種早晨不用喝咖啡的古怪人。

sentences.english: E. coli O157:H7 causes abdominal cramping, vomiting and a diarrheal illness, often with bloody stools.
sentences.chinese: H7能引起腹部絞痛，嘔吐和腹瀉，通常是血便。

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉鹼是一種營養，幫助人體脂肪轉化爲能量。

sentences.english: That's the lowest -ranking officer position in most banks.
sentences.chinese: 助理司庫是大多數銀行中主管級別中最低的一級。

sentences.english: The pity of it is that an intelligent man appears to have been seduced by the sound of his own voice.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，這位智者似乎被自己的聲音誤導了。

sentences.english: I grant that yours are of better quality.
sentences.chinese: 我授與你的是有較好的質量。

sentences.english: Who cut the strings, so Duanchang impact of the song.
sentences.chinese: 是誰剪斷了琴絃，彈着如此斷腸的曲。

sentences.english: Garden Cottages are a favorite of brides for their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 花園的別墅是他們的新婚之夜新娘最喜愛的一種。

sentences.english: I believed that the mixture of religion and politics was dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 意思是說政教合一是非常危險的。

sentences.english: I believed that the mixture of religion and politics was dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 意思是說政教合一是非常危險的。

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使計算機能夠從文本中提取意義的過程。

definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
